text: Zach Tyler Eisen (born 23 September 1993 in Stamford, Connecticut) is an American voice actor. He is known for playing Aang in Avatar. and Pablo in The Backyardigans. ==Filmography== Film Role Avatar: The Last Airbender AangNickelodeon.com - Aang The Ant Bully Lucas Nickle Little Bill Andrew The Backyardigans (1st season) Pablo the Penguin ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Stamford, Connecticut
title: Zach Tyler Eisen
